mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD ( SEQ, TITLE, CONTENTS, REG_ID, REG_DT, MOD_ID, MOD_DT, CHILD_REP ) VALUES ( #{BODSEQ.NEXTVAL}, #{title}, #{contents}, #{regId}, #{regDt}, #{modId}, #{modDt}, #{childRep} )
mapper.select:
select seq, title, reg_id, reg_dt from( select rownum rn, seq, title, reg_id, reg_dt from board where
title like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
reg_id like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
rownum<= #{num} * #{postNum} order by seq desc ) where rn>(#{num}-1)*#{postNum}
SELECT SEQ, TITLE, CONTENTS, REG_ID, REG_DT, MOD_ID, MOD_DT, CHILD_REP FROM BOARD WHERE SEQ = #{seq}
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET CONTENTS = #{contents}, TITLE = #{title}, MOD_ID = #{regId}, MOD_DT = SYSDATE, REG_DT = SYSDATE WHERE SEQ = #{seq}
